document_data.name: Forested Enclave of the Face of the Sun
document_data.mainbody: The '''Forested Enclave of the Face of the Sun''' was the largest temple constructed for [[Amaunator]], the Sun Lord.
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the [[Netherese]] enclave of [[Unity]].
document_data.Description: The main steeple of the Forested Enclave soared to a staggering 17 stories in height, allowing Amaunator's solar disk to be seen for miles in every direction.
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[Righteous Potentate]]s within the temple had a fondness for casting ''[[continual light]]'' on their shaved scalps. This practice caused the [[gnoll]]s of the nearby [[Facile Forest]] to make pilgrimages to the "lightened ones" and directed their raids elsewhere.
